title: Electronic Learning in Nephrology: Case-Based Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Training aimed at strengthening the diagnostic and assessment capabilities of field practitioners for kidney diseases, implementing a case-based e-learning environment reflecting post-COVID-19 demand for non-face-to-face learning.

learning_goals: Identify and explain at least three major clinical symptoms of nephrotic syndrome patients
Perform kidney-related physical examination procedures in a VR simulation environment with 80% accuracy
Analyze the pathophysiological mechanisms and clinical correlations of kidney diseases using case-based learning materials
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
